nodes.text: Rivels was a male Bith lieutenant serving the Galactic Republic who lived during the Cold War. He sold equipment modifications using planetary commendations as a currency at the Olaris Spaceport, in the bombed city world, on Taris.

Rivels appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Modification Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Taris. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Rivels was removed from the game along with the rest of the Modification Commendations Vendors.
